item.title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for December 26, 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Love and Relationship Horoscope for December 26, 2024

Date & Source: December 26, 2024

On December 26, 2024, the horoscope offers insights into love and relationships for each zodiac sign, encouraging self-reflection and open communication.

  • Aries: Embrace nostalgia to reflect on relationship patterns.
  • Taurus: Speak your truth to foster deeper connections.
  • Gemini: Express desires candidly within relationships.
  • Cancer: Confidence leads to flirtation and attraction.
  • Leo: Self-discovery enhances romantic connections.
  • Virgo: Taking breaks can rekindle romance.
  • Libra: Set love goals and dreams together.
  • Scorpio: Collaborate with friends for relationship insights.
  • Sagittarius: Reflect on growth in love journeys.
  • Capricorn: Face truths to deepen intimacy.
  • Aquarius: Small adventures can revitalize relationships.
  • Pisces: Infuse creativity for light-hearted connections.
“Love expands when it is fed with creativity and lightness.”

The guidance for today encourages individuals to embrace their feelings, communicate openly, and explore new experiences with partners or potential love interests.

item.title: Allu Arjun's dad gives 2 crore cheque to boy injured in stampede - The Times of India
item.description:
Allu Arjun's dad gives 2 crore cheque to boy injured in stampede

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

In a heartfelt gesture, the father of actor Allu Arjun has donated 2 crores to a young boy who was injured in a recent stampede. His support aims to aid in the boy's recovery and ensure he receives the necessary medical assistance.

  • The donation was made directly to support the boy's medical expenses.
  • Allu Arjun's family has a history of philanthropy and community support.
  • The incident highlights the ongoing need for awareness and support for victims of such tragedies.
“We hope this contribution can make a difference in the boy’s life,” said Allu's father.

This act of generosity is a reminder of the impact individuals can have in the lives of those affected by unfortunate events.

item.title: MT Vasudevan Nair: Celebrated Indian author dies at 91 - BBC.com
item.description:
MT Vasudevan Nair: Celebrated Indian Author Dies at 91

Publication Date: December 2023 | Source: Outlook India

MT Vasudevan Nair, a legendary writer from Kerala, has passed away at the age of 91 after being admitted to a hospital for breathing difficulties. Nair was not only a celebrated author but also an acclaimed film director and screenwriter.

  • Nair was born in 1933 in Palakkad, Kerala, and began writing from a young age despite minimal encouragement in his family.
  • He achieved significant acclaim for his novel Naalukettu, which won one of Kerala's highest literary honours in 1959.
  • His retelling of the Mahabharata in Randamoozham is regarded as a classic of Indian literature.
  • Nair was awarded India's highest literary honour, the Jnanpith, among other accolades during his career.
  • He also had a prolific career in Malayalam cinema, noted for his screenplay in Oru Vadakkan Veeragatha.
  • Tributes have poured in highlighting his impact on Malayalam literature and cinema.
"You can change the dialogues of any other films, but not MT's, since those dialogues are essential to understand the essence of what is being conveyed." - Mohanlal

Nair's legacy lives on through his extensive body of work, influencing generations of writers and filmmakers.

item.title: Justin Baldoni faces legal action from former publicist amid Blake Lively's sexual harassment lawsuit - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Justin Baldoni faces legal action from former publicist Steph Jones for breaching contract.

Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The drama surrounding Justin Baldoni and Blake Lively shows no signs of slowing down as Baldoni faces legal action from his former publicist, Steph Jones, who is suing for breach of contract.

  • Steph Jones is suing Justin Baldoni over a $25,000 monthly payment breach.
  • The lawsuit alleges a smear campaign against Blake Lively was conducted without Jones’s knowledge.
  • Blake Lively has also filed a separate lawsuit against Baldoni for sexual harassment on set.
  • Baldoni’s lawyer described Lively's accusations as false and a desperate attempt to fix her negative reputation.
“It is shameful that Ms. Lively and her representatives would make such serious and categorically false accusations against Mr. Baldoni.” – Bryan Freedman

This legal turmoil highlights the complexities of relationships in Hollywood and raises questions about workplace dynamics and reputation management.

item.title: M.T. Vasudevan Nair, doyen of Malayalam literature and cinema, passes away - The Hindu
item.description:
M.T. Vasudevan Nair, Doyen of Malayalam Literature and Cinema, Passes Away

Published on December 25, 2024, by The Hindu

Renowned writer and filmmaker M.T. Vasudevan Nair passed away in Kozhikode at the age of 91. He was a significant figure in Malayalam literature and cinema, known for his revolutionary contributions to screenplay writing and his timeless novels.

  • M.T. Vasudevan Nair died on December 25, 2024, in Kozhikode.
  • He was celebrated for his novels such as Randamoozham and Asuravithu.
  • His film debut as a director, Nirmalyam, won the National Award for Best Film in 1974.
  • Many of his works have become part of Malayali cultural life and continue to be published.
  • He was awarded the Jnanpith Award in 1995 and was a prolific screenwriter.
“M.T. championed modernism in his works.” - Kerala Governor Arif Mohammed Khan

M.T. Vasudevan Nair's passing marks the end of an era in Malayalam literature and cinema, leaving behind a legacy that will continue to inspire future generations.

item.title: Baby John box office collection day 1: Varun Dhawan film fails to beat Vijay's Theri, remake opens at ₹12 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Collection Day 1: The Varun Dhawan-Starrer Opens to Mixed Reviews

Publication Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Varun Dhawan-starrer 'Baby John' opened on December 25 but failed to beat the box office collection of its predecessor 'Theri'.

  • As per early estimates, 'Baby John' collected ₹12.5 crore on its opening day.
  • The film had 24.53% Hindi occupancy on the release day.
  • 'Theri' had an opening day collection of ₹13.1 crore despite only being released in Tamil Nadu.
  • 'Pushpa 2' continues to outperform 'Baby John' with ₹20.7 crore collection.
  • Directed by Kalees and produced by Atlee, the film stars also Jackie Shroff and Rajpal Yadav, with a cameo by Salman Khan.
The film starts off on a very choppy note, and there’s no soul for about 40 minutes.

In conclusion, 'Baby John' showcased a decent performance, but it struggled to surpass its competitors and faced criticism for its direction and storyline.

item.title: Justin Baldoni Sued By Former Publicist Amid Blake Lively's Sexual Misconduct Charge - NDTV
item.description:
Justin Baldoni Sued By Former Publicist Amid Blake Lively's Sexual Misconduct Charge

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 Source: New York Post

Justin Baldoni's former publicist, Stephanie Jones, has filed a lawsuit against him and his current publicity team, alleging breach of contract and involvement in a smear campaign against Blake Lively.

  • The lawsuit claims Baldoni failed to pay $25,000 per month as per their contract.
  • Jones alleges she had no involvement in a smear campaign against Lively and that Abel and Nathan are deflecting blame to her.
  • Jones discovered evidence of a retaliation campaign against Lively upon reviewing company correspondence.
  • Blake Lively has also filed a lawsuit against Baldoni for sexual harassment and misconduct, claiming a hostile work environment.
  • Allegations against Baldoni include inappropriate behavior and ignoring boundaries during filming of 'It Ends With Us.'
"To this day, Abel and Nathan continue to point the finger falsely at Jones now that their own misconduct is coming to light, and to defame and attack Jones in the industry."

The allegations raise serious questions regarding workplace conduct and the treatment of actors in Hollywood, highlighting ongoing issues of power dynamics and harassment in the film industry.

item.title: Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar bury the hatchet, announce their collaboration for a romantic comedy 'Tu Me - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar Collaborate on 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri'

Publication Date: Not available | Source: Not available

Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar have put their differences aside and announced their collaboration on a new romantic comedy film titled 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri'. This partnership marks a new chapter in their relationship and is generating excitement in the film industry.

  • Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar's collaboration is seen as a significant event in Bollywood.
  • The film is set to be a romantic comedy, a genre that both personalities have successfully engaged with in the past.
  • This collaboration signals a potential reconciliation between the two after previous tensions.
“It’s time to create magic together.” - Kartik Aaryan

The upcoming romantic comedy is highly anticipated by fans and industry insiders alike, highlighting a shift in Bollywood dynamics.

item.title: Photo Moment: Chiru proves age is just a number with his dashing new look - 123telugu
item.description:
Photo Moment: Chiru proves age is just a number with his dashing new look

Published on: Dec 25, 2024 9:07 pm IST

Chiranjeevi, affectionately known as Chiru, continues to defy age with his stunning new look, proving that age is merely a number. In his latest photoshoot, he showcases a blend of simplicity and vintage style.

  • Chiru is set to star in the upcoming pan-India film Vishwambhara.
  • The release of Vishwambhara has been postponed due to delays in VFX work.
  • The film features a star-studded cast including Trisha, Kunal Kapoor, and others.
  • Directed by Mallidi Vassishtha and produced by UV Creations, with music by MM Keeravani.
“Is the Megastar aging backwards?”

This new look enhances Chiru's timeless appeal and continues to captivate fans across generations.

item.title: Trisha's 'Son' Zorro Passes Away On Christmas, Shares Heartbreaking Note: 'I Am Broken, In Shock' - News18
item.description:
Trisha's 'Son' Zorro Passes Away On Christmas, Shares Heartbreaking Note: 'I Am Broken, In Shock'

Date: December 25, 2024   Source: News18

Tamil actress Trisha shared heartbreaking news on Christmas that her pet dog Zorro has passed away. She expressed her shock and sorrow, stating that she needs time off to grieve.

  • Trisha's pet dog Zorro passed away early on Christmas morning.
  • She shared an emotional note highlighting her loss and need for time away from work.
  • Fans flooded the comments section with condolences and support for the actress.
  • Zorro was a part of Trisha's life for over a decade and frequently appeared on her social media.
  • Trisha has several upcoming film projects lined up for future releases.
“My son Zorro passed away early this Christmas morning. For those who know me well know that my life has zero meaning henceforth. My family and I are broken and in a state of shock. Will be taking some time off work and will be off the radar.” - Trisha

The loss of Zorro marks a significant emotional moment for Trisha, who has shared a deep bond with her pet over the years.

item.title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor spend cosy Christmas evening with Soni Razdan, Shaheen Bhatt. See pics - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor Celebrate Christmas with Family

Date: December 25, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

This year, Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor enjoyed a cozy Christmas evening after celebrating with the Kapoor family, spending quality time with Alia's family in Mumbai.

  • The couple participated in the annual Kapoor lunch before celebrating with Alia's mom and sister.
  • Alia shared moments of love and joy on social media, highlighting their festive atmosphere.
  • Ranbir and Alia posed in festive attire, with Alia wearing a red dress for lunch and a white dress with Christmas-themed antlers for the evening.
  • Alia and Ranbir have exciting films coming up, including their collaboration in 'Love and War'.
“Under the twinkling lights, surrounded by love.. this is what Christmas feels like.” - Alia Bhatt

Overall, Alia and Ranbir’s Christmas celebration was filled with warmth, family, and anticipation for their upcoming projects.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' stampede: Producer Dil Raju says 'entire film industry' will meet Telangana CM on Thursday - The Times of India
item.description:
Pushpa 2' stampede: Producer Dil Raju says 'entire film industry' will meet Telangana CM on Thursday

Date: [Publication Date] | Source: Times of India

The unfortunate stampede incident at a screening of 'Pushpa 2' has sparked widespread concern, prompting the film industry to take action.

  • Producer Dil Raju expressed that the entire film industry will be meeting with the Chief Minister of Telangana.
  • The meeting aims to discuss the repercussions of the stampede and ensure the safety of attendees at future screenings.
  • Emergency protocols and safety measures are expected to be reviewed during this meeting.
“The safety of our viewers is our foremost priority,” said Dil Raju.

This tragic event has highlighted the need for improved crowd management at film events, as the industry takes steps to safeguard its audience.

item.title: Karan Johar ends feud with Kartik Aaryan, confirms new romantic comedy with him. Watch announcement - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Karan Johar ends feud with Kartik Aaryan, confirms new romantic comedy with him

Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Karan Johar and Kartik Aaryan have reconciled after a fallout, and will collaborate on a new romantic comedy film titled Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri, set to be released during Christmas 2026.

  • Kartik Aaryan leads the film, produced by Karan Johar's Dharma Productions.
  • The film is directed by Sameer Vidwans, who previously worked with Kartik.
  • Kartik announced the film on his X (formerly Twitter), adding humor to the announcement video.
  • The movie is a first-time collaboration between Johar and Aaryan.
  • The female lead of the film is yet to be announced.
“Mummy kasam khayi hain maine (I have taken mother’s promise),” Kartik states in the announcement video.

This announcement marks a significant moment in the relationship between the two key figures in Bollywood, signaling new beginnings and collaborations in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Alia Bhatt drops love-filled Christmas PICS with Ranbir Kapoor, Raha, Neetu, Shaheen and more; actress smelling her mom Soni Razdan’s cooking is all of us - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Alia Bhatt Drops Love-Filled Christmas PICS with Ranbir Kapoor, Raha, Neetu, Shaheen and More

Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Alia Bhatt recently shared a glimpse of her Christmas celebrations with her family and friends, showcasing love and warmth throughout the festivities.

  • Alia celebrated Christmas 2024 with Ranbir Kapoor, their daughter Raha, and family members including Neetu Kapoor, Soni Razdan, and Shaheen Bhatt.
  • She shared a series of pictures from the celebrations on her Instagram, highlighting moments like smelling her mom’s delicious cooking.
  • The post included a beautiful caption: “Under the twinkling lights, surrounded by love.. this is what Christmas feels like.”
  • Pics featured Alia in a white dress with a Christmas tree headband, holding her daughter Raha, who wore a red Christmas sweater.
“Under the twinkling lights, surrounded by love.. this is what Christmas feels like.”

This delightful Christmas cherishes the significance of family bonds and festive joy, making it relatable for many fans.

item.title: Varun Dhawan Regretted Rejecting Shraddha Kapoor After Seeing Her In College: 'When She Became A Teenager.. - News18
item.description:
Varun Dhawan Regretted Rejecting Shraddha Kapoor After Seeing Her In College

Date: December 25, 2024, Source: News18

Varun Dhawan reminisces about his childhood friendship with Shraddha Kapoor, including her childhood crush on him and his eventual regret for rejecting her.

  • Varun rejected Shraddha's crush at age eight, leading to a playful confrontation.
  • Years later, Varun saw Shraddha at a school event and was struck by her beauty.
  • The two have starred together in films like ABCD 2 and Street Dancer 3D.
“When Shraddha became a teenager, she had become extremely beautiful.” - Varun Dhawan

This nostalgic recollection highlights the playful nature of childhood relationships and their evolution over time.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 21: Allu Arjun movie refuses to slow down, mints ₹16.82 crore on Christmas | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 21: Allu Arjun movie refuses to slow down, mints ₹16.82 crore on Christmas

Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Live Mint

Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's action thriller 'Pushpa 2' continues to dominate the box office on its 21st day, collecting ₹16.82 crore on Christmas.

Worldwide collection

The film has grossed ₹1547.40 crore worldwide, becoming the third Indian movie to cross the ₹1500 crore mark.

  • The total domestic box office collection stands at ₹1106.92 crore.
  • Pushpa 2 has also collected ₹248 crore internationally.
  • The film achieved the ₹1500 crore mark in 18 days.
  • It is currently the second biggest grosser in India after 'Baahubali 2.'
“The #Christmas to #NewYear period traditionally witnesses an upswing at the #Boxoffice, and #Pushpa2 is expected to add substantial revenue to its already historic total... The ₹800 cr milestone now appears to be well within reach.” — Taran Adarsh

This film is expected to continue its impressive performance during the holiday season.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Horoscope Not Good, Claims Venuswamy.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Allu Arjun’s Horoscope Not Good, Claims Venuswamy

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Great Andhra

Venuswamy, a self-proclaimed astrologer, has made recent headlines by claiming that Allu Arjun's horoscope indicates upcoming challenges. His controversial statements come amid growing criticism and dwindling connections within the film industry.

  • Venuswamy is under fire for sharing the horoscopes of other celebrities.
  • He is facing legal troubles that have affected his professional relationships.
  • Despite the backlash, he attempts to remain relevant by commenting on astrological forecasts.
  • He claims Allu Arjun will experience difficulties until March, with improvements expected after March 29.
  • Venuswamy visited a hospital to provide support to a boy injured in a theater stampede and donated Rs 2 lakh to the family.
“According to Allu Arjun's horoscope, Saturn is in the sixth house, which indicates challenges. No one is immune to such phases.” - Venuswamy

Even in the midst of controversy, Venuswamy seems to be trying to regain his reputation by providing astrological insights into prominent figures like Allu Arjun.

item.description:
Alia Bhatt, Raha Kapoor, Neetu Kapoor, Navya Naveli, Agastya Nanda steal the spotlight in the Kapoor family Christmas celebrations

Publication Date: December 25

Source: Times of India

The Kapoor family came together for their annual Christmas lunch, showcasing their traditional festive spirit and heartwarming reunions.

  • The family posed in red-and-white Christmas-themed outfits.
  • Alia Bhatt was seen holding her daughter Raha, with other family members, including Ranbir Kapoor and Neetu Kapoor.
  • Fans expressed their affection in the comments section of Neetu's social media post.
  • Raha Kapoor charmed attendees with her cuteness during the gathering.
“Merry Christmas to all of you. Stay blessed and stay happy always. Love you all.”

The festive gathering highlights the Kapoor family's love and unity during Christmas celebrations.

item.title: Raha changes into red for a family photo with Alia-Ranbir; fans miss Kareena, Suhana at Kapoors’ annual Christmas - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Raha Kapoor Steals the Show at the Kapoors' Annual Christmas Gathering

Published on: Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha Kapoor delighted fans this Christmas as she interacted with paparazzi during the Kapoors’ annual family brunch, resulting in viral moments on social media.

  • Raha Kapoor, the daughter of Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor, was introduced to the public last Christmas.
  • This year, she made headlines by waving and blowing kisses to paparazzi.
  • Alia wore a stunning red satin dress, while Ranbir was stylish in a blue and white striped shirt.
  • Raha charmed everyone in a festive red checkered outfit.
  • Notable absentees from the family photo included Kareena Kapoor Khan and Suhana Khan, which fans expressed disappointment over.
“According to Kareena’s insta posts she’s in the UK with Saifu & the kids, so I guess she won’t be there for Christmas this year either,” commented a fan.

The Kapoor family continues to captivate fans with their charming gatherings, despite the absence of some familiar faces this year.

item.title: Malaika Arora Takes A Dig At Arjun Kapoor For His ‘I’m Single’ Comment: “I Will Never Choose A Public Platform…” - Koimoi
item.description:
Malaika Arora Takes A Dig At Arjun Kapoor For His ‘I’m Single’ Comment

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Koimoi

Malaika Arora responds to her ex Arjun Kapoor's declaration of singlehood during a media event, emphasizing her choice to keep her personal life private.

  • Malaika and Arjun ended their six-year relationship recently.
  • Arjun confirmed his single status at a Diwali party.
  • Malaika criticized the public discussion of personal life, stating she prefers privacy.
  • She expressed readiness for a fresh start in the new year.
“I will never choose a public platform to talk about my personal life. So, whatever Arjun has said is entirely his prerogative.”

Their breakup and subsequent comments highlight the challenges that come with public relationships and personal privacy in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Baby John Opening Day Box Office Trends: Varun Dhawan starrer aims at a Rs 12 crore start - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Baby John Opening Day Box Office Trends: Varun Dhawan starrer aims at a Rs 12 crore start

Published on Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Varun Dhawan led action entertainer, Baby John, has taken a promising start at the Indian box office, with early trends indicating a first-day business of Rs 11 crore to Rs 12 crore.

  • The film's performance benefited from the Christmas holiday but faced competition from other releases like Pushpa 2 and Mufasa.
  • It is suggested that without competition, Baby John could have opened in the range of Rs 13 crore to Rs 15 crore.
  • Despite the challenges, this is the best opening for Varun Dhawan among recent non-franchise films, barring 83 directed by Kabir Khan.
  • The holiday period ahead offers opportunities for Baby John to potentially achieve Rs 100 crore by the end of its run.
  • The first day's drop and subsequent hold in business on Day 2 and Day 3 will be crucial in determining its long-term trajectory.
“It’s a decent start for Baby John, but the trend over the next few days is crucial.”

In conclusion, while Baby John shows promise, its success will depend on audience turnout in the coming days amid ongoing competition.

item.title: Sridevi was upset for 6 months after Boney Kapoor.. , said 'How can you...' - India.com
item.description:
Sridevi was upset for 6 months after Boney Kapoor.. , said ‘How can you…’

Publication Date: Not provided Source: India.com

Boney Kapoor shared how Sridevi was emotionally disturbed for six months after he confessed his love for her amidst the complexities of his previous marriage.

  • Boney Kapoor's love story with Sridevi was characterized by affection but also challenges.
  • Their relationship evolved over time as Boney separated from his first wife.
  • Sridevi initially hesitated to accept Boney's proposal due to his previous marriage and the resulting complications.
  • Boney emphasized the importance of honesty in relationships.
  • He reflected on how true selves are revealed only after years in a relationship.
“I loved her, I love her and I will love her till my death.” - Boney Kapoor

This narrative highlights the emotional depths of their relationship and the significance of honesty and patience in love.

item.title: MEGA EXCLUSIVE: Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar join hands for Rs. 150 crore action love story; Sameer Vidhwans to direct - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar Collaborate on Ambitious Rs. 150 Crore Action Love Story

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar are set to collaborate on their first film together, an action-packed love story directed by Sameer Vidhwans, known for Satyaprem Ki Katha.

  • The project has been in discussion for a long time and is now officially in place.
  • The film has a budget of Rs. 150 crores and is described as one of the most ambitious love stories of modern times.
  • Kartik Aaryan is enthusiastic about returning to the big screen after his role in Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3.
  • The film will be co-produced by Dharma Productions and Namah Pictures, with an announcement expected within two days.
"It's an ambitious film to be made on a budget of Rs. 150 crores, and the entire team is very excited to bring the film to the audience in 2026."

This collaboration could have significant implications for both Aaryan's and Johar's careers, merging their fanbases and setting high expectations for the film's success.

item.title: Pushpa 2’s Dammunte Pattukora song taken down – Fans left confused - 123telugu
item.description:
Pushpa 2’s Dammunte Pattukora Song Taken Down – Fans Left Confused

Published on Dec 25, 2024 5:58 pm IST

Icon Star Allu Arjun recently delivered a blockbuster with Pushpa 2: The Rule, which has grossed over Rs. 1500 crores in record time. T-Series Telugu released a new track titled Dammunte Pattukora, based on powerful dialogue from the film, but it was taken down shortly after release, leaving fans confused and questioning the abrupt removal.

  • The song was based on a key dialogue from the film.
  • It was released by T-Series just yesterday.
  • Fans are left wondering why it was taken down so quickly.
  • The film features Rashmika Mandanna alongside Allu Arjun.
“Fans are now eagerly waiting to see when the track will return to the platform.”

The confusion surrounds the quick removal, and only the Pushpa 2 team and T-Series may have the answers.

item.title: Recap 2024: Top 10 K-Drama ACTRESSES Ranked! Kim Ji-Won To Park Shin-Hye, Chae Soo-Bin To Kim Hye-Yoon, Here A - Times Now
item.description:
Recap 2024: Top 10 K-Drama Actresses Ranked!

Date: 2024

Source: Times Now

2024 was one of the best years for performances, especially with women-centric themes. Here are the top 10 female performers who stole hearts with their career-defining roles.

  • 10. Han So-Hee - Gyeongseong Creature: An emotionally charged performance in a thrilling season.
  • 9. Seo Hyun-Jin - The Trunk: A versatile actress, delivering excellence in mystery and romance.
  • 8. Park Min-Young - Marry My Husband: Capturing heartbreak and angst in a riveting revenge story.
  • 7. Shin Min-Ah - No Gain No Love: A comedic talent that balances laughter and heartfelt moments.
  • 6. Jung So-Min - Love Next Door: A rom-com queen who embodies relatable bickering convincingly.
  • 5. Chae Soo-Bin - When The Phone Rings: An impressive portrayal of a selective mute through expressive acting.
  • 4. Jang Na-Ra - Good Partner: Transitioning from sweet roles to a cold-hearted lawyer brilliantly.
  • 3. Park Shin-Hye - The Judge From Hell: A character that's ruthless yet captivatingly complex.
  • 2. Kim Hye-Yoon - Lovely Runner: Exceptional performance across different life stages and her chemistry is noteworthy.
  • 1. Kim Ji-Won - Queen of Tears: Her maturity as an actress has propelled her to the top with standout performances.

Special Mention: Kim Go-Eun - Exhuma: A remarkable performance that outshines rankings with her blend of thrills and emotion.

Who is your favourite actress of 2024? Let us know at @TimesNow.
